title: WOW! WOW! WOW!
review:
This is a really great film.
It is non stop action.
My heart was in my mouth nearly the whole time.
All the actors were amazing & so realistic.
I felt I was actually in the boat with Captain Phillips.

title: A REALLY GREAT FILM
review:
I thought the whole film was absolutely excellent.
Of course there are fictitious scenes but these are necessary to make certain essential points.
